fr.dogstellar.core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dogstellar.core.Perso
      • fr.dogstellar.core.Player

  • public class Player
extends Perso
    This class gives the characteristics of the player (name lifePoint, attackPoint and inventory). This class is an inheritance of the Perso class which we added a inventory that is a list of Stuffs.
    Version:
    21/11/2017
    Author:
    Gp3

      Weapon weapon

      Player(java.lang.String nameP)
      Constructor for objects of class Player When a player is creating, a inventory (list of stuffs) is create and is empty

      this method allows us to equip the player with a weapon
